summary:
Communications | Events | Marketing Strategy | Brand Awareness | Customer Acquisition | Revenue Growth | Cross-functional Collaboration | Targeted Communication Plans | Data-driven Approach | Market Research| Competitive Analysis | Strategic Marketing Plans | Data Analysis | Social Media 

With over 7+ years of experience in Strategic Marketing, Social Media, and Communication Analysis, I am a seasoned professional in driving Brand Awareness, Customer Acquisition, and Revenue Growth. Throughout my career, I have collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and implement targeted communication plans, ensuring clear and consistent messaging. I conducted thorough analysis of communication strategies and channels, identifying areas for improvement and implementing effective solutions. 

With a data-driven approach, I have monitored and evaluated the impact of communication campaigns, aligning them with organizational goals. Additionally, I have excelled in creating internal communication materials and managing various communication platforms, including social media and intranet. My expertise in market research and competitive analysis has allowed me to develop strategic marketing plans, optimizing performance metrics and driving continuous improvement.

I have a Bachelor's degree in Public Relations from Metodista University, Brazil and fluency in Portuguese, and English, I bring a strong foundation in effective communication and cross-cultural understanding. Additionally, I am currently studying Dutch, to further expand my language proficiency. As a detail-oriented professional, I have also coordinated strategies across multiple projects, ensuring efficient execution and timely delivery of key messages. With skills in CRM management, data analysis, and social media maintenance, I am committed to driving effective communication strategies that deliver impactful results.

# SEO, Social Media Marketing 
# Grow Strategy
# Digital Marketing
# Content strategy
# Event Planning

EU Visa | Right to live and work

projects.title: Sabores da Comunicação
projects.description: Development of an experimental project, developed as part of the student agency Sexto Elemento, for the Santa Pasta client company, whose objective was to develop a Public Relations plan to structure communication practices in the company and solidify its relationship with its different publics.

profile_positions.description:
• Coordinating schedules and strategies across multiple projects, ensuring efficient execution and alignment with Academic Medical Education goals.

• Conduct proofreading and copywriting of internal and external communications outputs to maintain consistency and accuracy in messaging.

• Managing CRM system, including data entry, maintenance, and analysis, to support effective customer relationship management.

• Collect data on website performance, social media engagement, and other communication channels to evaluate effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.

• Maintaining social media channels and websites, regularly updating content and monitoring user engagement.

• Liaise with project teams to develop and implement communication actions, ensure effective collaboration and timely delivery of key messages.

Communication I Strategic Insights I Social Media I Performance
profile_positions.title: Communications Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
• Assist in the development and execution of marketing campaigns and strategies to promote brand awareness and drive customer engagement.

• Conducting  market research, identifying opportunities for product positioning and target audience expansion.

• Support the creation of marketing materials, including content writing, graphic design, and social media posts, to ensure consistent brand messaging.

• Managing social media platforms and website content, monitoring performance metrics and implementing optimization strategies to enhance online presence.

• Collaborate in organizing marketing events, such as trade shows and product launches, including logistics, vendor coordination, and post-event analysis.

• Coordinating  with internal teams and external stakeholders to facilitate marketing initiatives, ensuring effective communication and project execution.

Creativity | Brand Strategist | Data-Driven Thinking |  Project Manager
profile_positions.title: Marketing Assistant

profile_positions.description:
• Developing strategic marketing plans, driving brand awareness, customer acquisition, and revenue growth for a diverse rage of industries.

• Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify market trends, customer needs, and opportunities for differentiation.

• Recognising the demands of the target market to create marketing strategies that are successful across numerous media, including digital, social media, and conventional advertising.

• Create compelling marketing content, including website, blog articles, and social media posts, to engage and educate target audiences.

• Monitoring  marketing performance metrics, such as website traffic, conversion rates, campaign ROI, to optimizing marketing strategies and tactics.

• Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging trends, provide insights and recommendations to drive continuous improvement and innovation in marketing efforts.

Strategy I Marketing I Customer Acquisition I Trends
profile_positions.title: Strategic Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Developing original written and visual content for various audiences in Itaú bank.

Implement marketing campaigns and materials (press releases, infographics, videos, public relations plans, and media plans) to achieve established KPI's.

Managing website analytics, content development for social media platforms and newsletter.
Directly supervising communications team members and interns.

Coordinating large, complex, and multi-disciplinary communications projects in the LATAM region.
Led digital communication transformation initiatives, identify opportunities for process optimization and efficiency improvement.

Newsletter I Marketing Campaign I Manager I Communications

profile_positions.description:
• Conduct thorough analysis of communication strategies and channels, assess their effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.

• Monitoring communication campaigns, measuring their impact and ensuring alignment with the banks goals.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement targeted communication plans, ensure clear and consistent messaging.

Strategy I Communication I Social Media I Internal Platform
profile_positions.title: Communication Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Assessing business processes through comprehensive surveys and analysis of key performance indicators.

• Proactively identify areas for improvement and anticipate requirements, and implement effective solutions.

• Establishing follow-up workflows, establishing project goals, and monitoring proposed indicators on a monthly basis.

• Contribute to the growth of Itaú by analyzing data, generate reports, and deliver training programs.

• Providing support to the company's critical projects, offering recommendations for improvements and implementing necessary changes.

• Foster the development of best practices, offer guidance, and provide assistance to less-experienced administrative staff members.

Training I Indicators I Surveys I Workflows
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Conducted meetings with senior managers from the bank to establish and analyze business processes, breaking them down into specific steps for a detailed assessment.

Collaborating with cross-functional teams, gathering data through research and observation to drive operational efficiency and continuous improvement initiatives.

Analyze Itaú data to identify patterns or trends to help reach a solution for current projects.

Creating documents and reports to summarize present findings and recommendations.

Communicating results to all levels in the organization.

Utilize data analytics software and programs as needed.

Business Process I OPtimization I Analytics I Project Development
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Evaluating credit applications for Itaú by analyzing financial statements, credit reports, and other relevant information to determine the borrower's conditions.

Prepare detailed credit analysis reports, including financial ratios, cash flow projections, and risk assessments, to support credit decisions and recommendations.

Conducting thorough due diligence on prospective borrowers, verifying their financial information and assessing their ability to repay debt obligations.

Collaborate with internal teams, such as sales and underwriting, to gather additional information and obtain clarifications on credit applications.

Monitoring the credit performance of existing borrowers, conducting periodic reviews and assessments identifying potential risks or changes in their creditworthiness.

Stay updated on industry trends, regulatory changes, and best practices.

Finance I Operations I Team Leader I Customer Focus
profile_positions.title: Credit Analyst

volunteer_experiences.description: I implemented an iniciative in Ação Voluntária Uso Consciente do Dinheiro, which program is a program aim ed at raising awareness on the importance of making wise choices on how to spend money in our daily lives.

The activity is an initiative of the Instituto Unibanco and seeks to encourage the young high school students from public schools to reflect on the benefits of completing the studies. Application of ludic activities focusing on the importance of studies for human development. The project presented proposals to reduce school dropout by raising awareness of the importance of the study.

SPEAK is a social volunteer platform that contributes to inclusive cities where everyone feels at home and where diversity is advocated.
As an ambassador I am responsible for planning, developing and hosting events in the city of Utrecht connecting newcomers and locals.
I also work in advertising the activities that are carried out, focusing on community engagement ensuring participation and providing those involved with the opportunity to expand their networkings and make friends.
